alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued February 25 at 4:49AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...ADDITIONAL HEAVY RAINFALL AND RENEWED RISES IN RIVER LEVELS EXPECTED NEXT WEEK... Widespread rain is expected across the area late Sunday night through Monday afternoon. The current forecast is for 0.75 to 1.25 inches of rainfall during this period. High soil moisture content across the area due to recent heavy rainfall will lead to a large percentage of this additional rainfall to be runoff. River levels remain elevated and runoff from additional rainfall will lead to renewed rises on area rivers next week. In addition to aggravating river flooding across the area, some flooding of low lying and flood prone areas is possible, particularly if the higher amounts in the forecasted range are realized early next week. There is still some uncertainty in precipitation amounts on Monday and exactly where the heaviest rainfall will set up. Persons should closely monitor forecasts over the next several days including the possibility of any flood watches, warnings, and advisories.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph
